item.description: M-design Lab. We develop Multiscale Modeling Methods to understand complex Molecular Mechanism and therby to design new functional Materials. Welcome to our tutorials website! Home →

item.title: Download
item.description: Download You can download all files used in tutorials. The latest release of our source codes will be available from GitHub here. If you have any queries about files, you can reach me: m.design.dft.ces@gmail.com Small Molecule in Water Slab System
